name: Lodestone
longDescription:
Lodestone is a free, open source server hosting tool designed for Minecraft and other multiplayer games. It aims to be easy to use, secure, and feature-rich, built with Rust, React, and TypeScript.

Key features include a clean UI, one-click installation, real-time server status, a file manager, collaborative server management, user permissions, extensions via macros, and connection without port forwarding via playit.gg integration.

Lodestone prioritizes safety and security, with user permission management and a focus on secure coding practices. It supports managing Docker containers (work in progress).
description: Open source server hosting tool for Minecraft and other multiplayer games
